# DATAFILE::DATADICT_SET_FLOAT

## Summary
Sets a name-value pair in the specified dictionary

## Parameters
* **DATAFILE_DICT** dict: The dictionary object
* **STRING** name: The name of the data item
* **FLOAT** value: The new value of the data item

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
This will overwrite any existing dictionary entry with the same name
